title: To change view in your application you can use
setState
c
- this will re-render your component and any of its child components. setState performs a shallow merge between the new and previous state, and triggers a re-render of the component.

inline_content.Text: To change view in your application you can use
- this will re-render your component and any of its child components. setState performs a shallow merge between the new and previous state, and triggers a re-render of the component.

title: setState
c
takes either a key-value object or a function that returns a key-value object

inline_content.Text: takes either a key-value object or a function that returns a key-value object

title: Using a function is useful for updating a value based off the existing state or props.

inline_content.Text: Using a function is useful for updating a value based off the existing state or props.

title: You can also pass an optional callback to
setState
c
that will be fired when the component has re-rendered with the new state.

that will be fired when the component has re-rendered with the new state.
